title: Timings Calculations
custom_preconds: Timecodes have been entered into the UI by the ADM
custom_steps:
Time from Call to challenge 			= (Challenge 			minus 	Call on the field)
Time on headset 				= (Headset off 			minus 	Headset on)
Time from challenge to ruling 			= (Ruling 			minus 	Challenge)
Time from call to next pitch			= (Next pitch 			minus 	Call on the Field)
Time from call to initial announcement		= (initial announcement start	minus 	Call on the Field)
Time from challenge to initial announcement	= (initial announcement start	minus 	Challenge)
Length of initial announcement			=((initial announcement end	minus	initial announcement start)
Time from replay off. decision to post review ann=(post review announce start	minus	(headset on + time on 2 min clock))
Length of post review announcement		=(post review ann end	        minus	post review ann start)
Time from FTC EoP to Challenge			=(15 secs			minus	time left on FTC clock)
